document_data.name: Riti
document_data.mainbody: '''Riti''' was a [[githyanki]] fighter with a little training in [[magic]]. He was once a slave before his entrapment in a strange device of [[the Underdark]].
document_data.Possessions: Riti fought with a two-handed sword and wore [[leather armor]]. He owned a [[curse]]d [[spear]] called [[Backbiter (spear)|''Backbiter'']], which would inflict damage on the wielder when it struck another. The githyanki also owned a [[scroll]] of ''[[improved haste]]''.
document_data.History: Riti may have been released from the third-from-the-left chamber of the [[Facet sphere]]. If released, he told [[Gorion's Ward]] that he would not be enslaved again. The githyanki mentioned that he must erase the "living death" and fight for a place at the side of [[Gith]].
